title: #TheRemix: Filmmaker Stanley Nelson Discusses New Documentary on The Black Panther Party
content: "Black Panthers: Vanguard of the Revolution"  is a the new documentary from Stanley Nelson. Nelson is the Emmy  nominated, Peabody Award, and  MacArthur Foundation Award winning  director of a body of work that includes films on Emmett Till, Marcus Garvey and the Freedom Riders.  Nelson talks with #TheRemix Host James Braxton Peterson.
